template <dimension_type NewDim>
class vsip::impl::Redim_expr
File: ../../../vsip/opt/expr/redim_block.hpp

Reduction to redimension an expression from x-dimensional (where x > 1) to 1-dimensional.

Transform expression block dimensions to 1, keeps dense blocks (which are 1,x-dimensional) as is, wraps other blocks with Redim_block.
